techmeme.title: How Russian design firm Art Lebedev's Optimus keyboards, with built-in OLED screens in each key, laid the foundations for Elgato's popular Stream Deck (The Verge)
Fujitsu makes a "significant investment" in Cohere to build and launch Japanese language LLMs, including "Takane", which is based on Cohere's Command R+ LLM (Shubham Sharma/VentureBeat)
Sources: the US is mulling imposing the foreign direct product rule, seen as draconian by allies, on Tokyo Electron and ASML's chip equipment business in China (Bloomberg)
Sources: GitLab, which has a market cap of ~$8B, is exploring a sale after attracting interest from peers, including Datadog, which has a market cap of $44B (Reuters)
ASML reports Q2 net sales of €6.24B ($6.8B) vs. €6.03B est., net income of €1.58B vs. €1.43B est., and expects 2024 total net sales to be similar to 2023 (Arjun Kharpal/CNBC)
